Class CacheLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • CacheLine

  • public class CacheLine
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulates one line in cache.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CacheLine(int lineSize, int numTagBits)
      Constructor for a line of cache.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • CacheLine

        public CacheLine(int lineSize,
                 int numTagBits)
        Constructor for a line of cache. The valid bit is initialized to false, and lastUsed is initialized to -1. All other data members are initialized with random data to simulate the cache initially being filled with unknown values.
        Parameters:
        lineSize - The size of one cache line, in Bytes. Must be a multiple of 4 Bytes.
        numTagBits - The number bits for the tag.

        Throws:
